attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to ...
give preferential treatment to foreign nationals who wish to gain British citizenship and who have demonstrated above average service to Britain, and in particular the British Armed Services.
We feel that the British Government has a duty of care for foreign nationals who have put themselves at risk, and face further risk upon the withdrawal of troops from areas of conflict, as a result of their service to Britain and the British Armed Forces. 
We feel that this duty of care can best be demonstrated (and indeed is more economic of resources) by providing preferential treatment for those foreign nationals who have served Britain and wish to become British citizens.
In addition, we feel that as a general rule those who have demonstrated service to Britain in any way and have a desire to become British citizens, should receive priority over those who have not shown such service to Britain.
